work.name: Huawei Technologies
work.summary: Maintained critical financial systems with high availability requirements

achievements: Reduced security incidents by 2% through proactive measures

work.name: Shining Hope For Communities (SHOFCO)
work.summary: Led data analysis for COVID-19 vaccination optimization
highlights: Automated data processing and reporting using Python, generating over 300 reports to optimize COVID-19 vaccination strategies
Analyzed data trends to support decision-making, contributing to a 2% increase in vaccination rates
Delivered actionable insights to stakeholders, improving resource allocation and outreach initiatives
achievements: Developed an automated data pipeline to reduce manual reporting time
Improved vaccination outreach by identifying misinformed and under-targeted demographics
Increased report generation speed through automation
